fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a player at night if you have bullets.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with 0 bullets.
- Each time someone is attacked (but not by you), you gain 1 bullet.
- Your attack becomes Basic if you have 2 bullets, Powerful if you have 3 bullets, and Unstoppable if you have 6 bullets.
- If you shoot an innocent player you lose all bullets and can't gain any more.
